TopicTitle: Models with auto shroud: After time warp shroud is not centered

Articles.Content:
For the past four versions of KSP, models with an auto shroud ( example: the squad stock inflatable heat shield ), when you leave the hardware by going to space center, time warp and return to them... the shroud part of the model is canted off axis like it is loose. 

It does not happen every time, but 50% of the time if you send for example the stock inflatable heat shield to Duna with it's auto shroud deployed, then go off and do some other things, when you space center back to it, the shroud will be off axis and slid over to one side about 5 degrees.
Have observed the same...

I observe loose shrouds on my spacecraft all the time upon returning my attention to them.  I attribute it to shoddy craftsmanship.  Duct tape needs to be added as a stock component.

https://imgur.com/a/VPmeG
Have you posted a bug report about this?
Yup, happens here too. Mostly in modded saves, not really in stock-ish game.
I’ve seen this in stock and modded games. It’s less frequent in 1.3.1 than in earlier builds. Usually a scene change will correct it.
